sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Contract Request">b7bf37d69f7302107f4489554524ab01</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0dcf7b5a9f7302107f4489554524abcf</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set CONR ds value on conType change - SC</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    var contractType = g_form.getValue("u_contract_type");
    var requestedFor = g_form.getDisplayBox("requested_for").value;

    if (!contractType || !requestedFor) {
        return;
    }

    var newShortDescription = "Please create a new " + contractType + " Contract for " + requestedFor + ".";

    g_form.setValue("description", newShortDescription, "Description");

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-06 13:08:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>387b30669f3702107f4489554524ab2a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set CONR ds value on conType change - SC</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ContractSync" source="x_cdltd_contractsy">59295f459fb302107f4489554524abd8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ContractSync">59295f459fb302107f4489554524abd8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_387b30669f3702107f4489554524ab2a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-06 13:09:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
